local_intent: Translate the gripper along +Y by 0.1 m while maintaining a stable grasp to perform the fold transfer.
assumptions: Cloth edge is already grasped and slightly lifted
Y-axis translation of 0.1 m advances the fold direction
coherence_with_global: Implements the MoveDelta(y, 0.1, 1200 ms) step between lift and lowering, verifying stable grasp before and after the motion.
